channel.title: Right Click > Compile
channel.description:
Credits Ruckus - Idea Carmofreak - Some Code create a new file call it "java_auto_file.reg" put the following code inside of it. [code]REGEDIT4 [HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SOFTWARE\Classes\java_auto_file] @="" "EditFlags"=dword:00000000 "BrowserFlags"=dword:00000008 "AlwaysShowExt"="" [HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SOFTWARE\Classes\java_auto_file\DefaultIcon] @="C:\\Program Files\\Java\\jdk1.5.0_09\\bin\\java.exe,0" [HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SOFTWARE\Classes\java_auto_file\shell] @="" [HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SOFTWARE\Classes\java_auto_file\shell\Compile] [HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SOFTWARE\Classes\java_auto_file\shell\Compile\command] @="\"C:\\java.bat\" \"%1\""[/code] create a new batch file in the C:\ Drive Called "java.bat" and put the following code inside of it.
@echo off javac %* pause
and now you can right click on .java files and press compile :)

item.title: Right Click > Compile
item.dc:creator: @Ollie Ollie
item.description:
@Ollie wrote:

add this to the file

[HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SOFTWARE\Classes\java_auto_file\shell\Decompile]
HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SOFTWARE\Classes\java_auto_file\shell\Decompile\command]
@="“C:\decompile.bat” “%1"”

Read full topic

item.title: Right Click > Compile
item.dc:creator: @Silver_Lining Silver Lining
item.description:
@Silver_Lining wrote:

Where is it defined in there to show up for “.java” files? I’m trying to add a similar one titled “Decompile”

Read full topic

item.title: Right Click > Compile
item.dc:creator: @Ollie Ollie
item.description:
@Ollie wrote:

Credits
Ruckus - Idea
Carmofreak - Some Code

create a new file call it “java_auto_file.reg”
put the following code inside of it.

[code]REGEDIT4

[HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SOFTWARE\Classes\java_auto_file]
@=""
“EditFlags”=dword:00000000
“BrowserFlags”=dword:00000008
“AlwaysShowExt”=""

[HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SOFTWARE\Classes\java_auto_file\DefaultIcon]
@=“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_09\bin\java.exe,0”

[HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SOFTWARE\Classes\java_auto_file\shell]
@=""

[HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SOFTWARE\Classes\java_auto_file\shell\Compile]

[HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SOFTWARE\Classes\java_auto_file\shell\Compile\command]
@="“C:\java.bat” “%1"”[/code]

create a new batch file in the C:\ Drive Called “java.bat” and put the following code inside of it.

@echo off javac %* pause

and now you can right click on .java files and press compile

Read full topic
